root.message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 13-2-1, translated into en
root.data:
Green growth is an important content of sustainable development, ensuring fast, effective and sustainable economic development and making an important contribution to the implementation of the National Strategy on climate change.

The percentage of ministries/sectors and provinces/cities directly under the Central Government that have issued a Green Growth Action Plan is the percentage of ministries/sectors and provinces/cities directly under the Central Government that have issued the Action Plan on green growth compared to the total number of ministries/sectors and provinces/cities directly under the Central Government.
